document_data.name: Carp Alderleaf
document_data.mainbody: '''Carp Alderleaf''' was a young [[halfling]] boy that lived in [[Phandalin]].
document_data.Description: The lad of ten years aspired to become an adventurer. He had high spirits and enjoyed playing in the nearby woods.
document_data.Relationships: He was friends with [[Pip Stonehill]], and shared secrets with him.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} Carp discovered a secret tunnel by chance. He saw [[Redbrands]] come out of it, and rendezvous with others, leading him to believe the bandits had a base under the [[Tresendar Manor]]. Carp managed to sneak off without being caught.
